message.name: ERR_CERTIFICATION_XRV_CERTIFICATION_TYPE_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: The Certification Type must be entered.

message.name: ERR_CERTIFICATION_XRV_CERTIFICATION_CATEGORY_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: The Certification Category must be entered.

message.name: ERR_CERTIFICATION_XRV_CREDITS_REQUIRED_MUST_BE_GREATER_THAN_ZERO
message.locale: Credits Required must be greater than zero.

message.name: ERR_CERTIFICATION_XRV_ONLY_ACTIVE_RECORDS_CAN_BE_MODIFIED
message.locale: This certification has already been canceled, it cannot be modified.
This certification has already been cancelled, it cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_CERTIFICATION_XRV_ONLY_ACTIVE_RECORDS_CAN_BE_DELETED
message.locale: This certification has already been canceled, it cannot be deleted
This certification has already been cancelled, it cannot be deleted

message.name: ERR_CERTIFICATION_XRV_ACTIVE_MEMBER_EXISTS
message.locale: The certificate has been issued to a member, and has not yet expired, hence cannot be deleted.

message.name: ERR_CERTIFICATION_XFV_ONLY_ONE_ISSUER_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: Only one of either the Agency, Organization Unit or External Issuer can be entered for the Issuer.
Only one of either the Agency, Organisation Unit or External Issuer can be entered for the Issuer.

message.name: ERR_CERTIFICATION_XFV_VALIDITY_PERIOD_UNITS_MUST_BE_ENTERED_IF_VALIDITY_PERIOD_IS_ENTERED
message.locale: The Validity Period Units must be entered if Validity Period is entered.

message.name: ERR_CERTIFICATION_XFV_VALIDITY_PERIOD_MUST_BE_ENTERED_IF_VALIDITY_PERIOD_UNITS_IS_ENTERED
message.locale: The Validity Period must be entered if Validity Period Units is entered.
